title: Position OwnerPhoto widget at bottom-right corner

requirements.summary: Move the OwnerPhoto floating widget to the bottom-right corner with proper separation from the FloatingWhatsApp button
acceptanceCriteria: The OwnerPhoto component is fixed to the bottom-right corner of the screen on all viewport sizes.
The OwnerPhoto does not overlap the FloatingWhatsApp button â€” there is clear vertical separation between the two.
The circular owner photo, glow ring, and name label are fully visible and not clipped.
The widget remains in the bottom-right on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Update the positioning classes of the OwnerPhoto component to place it at the bottom-right corner using fixed positioning (e.g., bottom-24 right-4) to ensure vertical separation above the FloatingWhatsApp button. Verify that the circular photo container, glow ring animation, and name label remain fully visible and not clipped on all viewport sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop). Ensure the component uses the generated owner photo image at frontend/public/assets/generated/owner-photo.dim_120x120.png.
